subject: Science
question: Question: The structure of these entities can be explained by the existence of quasi-static standing density waves according to the Lin-Shu theory, and they have a supermassive black hole at the center of their bulge. [10] Name this type of galaxy which occupies the top and bottom branches of the Hubble Tuning Fork diagram. The Milky Way is one example of this type of galaxy.
